title: Episode 812 - Special Guest Jonathan Kite
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by comedian and actor Jonathan Kite of '2 Broke Girls' and 'Dad You're Embarrassing Me' to talk about his days working at the Cheesecake Factory, working with Jamie Foxx, auditioning for sketch comedy shows, and...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by comedian and actor Jonathan Kite of '2 Broke Girls' and 'Dad You're Embarrassing Me' to talk about his days working at the Cheesecake Factory, working with Jamie Foxx, auditioning for sketch comedy shows, and his love of college basketball -- plus Jonathan does incredible impressions of Chris Hemsworth, Liam Neeson, Tom Hanks, Anthony Bourdain, and Wallace Shawn.
